NK106(me)004:1: // ma h+aa sa n+d+hi d+h+y+aa na bi sh+r+aa n+ta n+n+aa ma bi dza h+aa ra ma //
NK106(me)004:2: rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan ngal gso zhes bya ba bzhugs /
NK106(me)004:4: ma h+aa san+d+hi d+h+y+aa na bi sh+r+aan+ta n+aa ma /
NK106(me)004:6: rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan ngal gso zhes bya ba /
NK106(me)004:7: dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK106(me)004:8: gdod ma'i rang bzhin mkha' mnyam dag pa'i dbyings //
NK106(me)004:9: chos mchog mi g.yo shin tu spros dang bral //
NK106(me)004:10: 'od gsal sems nyid byang chub snying po la //
NK106(me)004:11: gzhi rdzogs 'pho 'gyur med par phyag 'tshal lo //
NK106(me)004:12: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa shin tu rmad byung gang //
NK106(me)004:13: so so rang rig ye shes rtogs bya'i phyir //
NK106(me)004:14: rgyud lung man ngag snying po'i bcud bsdus te //
NK106(me)004:15: ji ltar nyams su blangs bzhin bshad kyis nyon //
NK106(me)004:16: ri rtse nags khrod mtsho gling la sogs pa //
NK106(me)004:17: dus bzhi yid dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu //
NK106(me)004:18: rtse gcig mi g.yo zhi ba'i ting 'dzin ni //
NK106(me)004:19: 'od gsal spros dang bral ba bsgom par bya //
NK106(me)004:20: gnas dang gang zag nyams su blang bya'i chos //
NK106(me)004:21: rnam gsum rang bzhin dag las 'grub par 'gyur //
NK106(me)004:22: dang po gnas ni dben zhing nyams dga' bar //
NK106(me)004:23: dus bzhi'i rnal 'byor dag dang mthun pa ste //
NK106(me)004:24: dbyar ni gangs dang ri rtse la sogs par //
NK106(me)004:25: smyug ma 'od ma 'jag khang la sogs par //
NK106(me)004:26: bsil sar bsil khang nang du bsgom par bya //
NK106(me)004:27: ston ni nags khrod ri ngogs brag rdzong sogs //
NK106(me)004:28: bsil drod snyoms pas gnas dang khang bu ru //
NK106(me)004:29: zas gos spyod lam de dang mthun par bya //
NK106(me)004:30: dgun ni nags khrod brag phug sa khung sogs //
NK106(me)004:31: dma' ba'i gnas dang dro ba'i sa phyogs su //
NK106(me)004:32: zas gos mal cha la sogs rjes mthun bya //
NK106(me)004:33: dpyid ni ri dang nags 'dab mtsho gling dang //
NK106(me)004:34: bsil drod snyoms par rjes mthun khang pa ru //
NK106(me)004:35: zas gos spyod lam mthun pa shin tu gces //
NK106(me)004:36: phyi nang rten 'brel gcig pas de yi phyir //
NK106(me)004:37: yid 'ong dben la nyams dag'i gnas la brten //
NK106(me)004:38: ri rtse shes pa dngas la rgya che bas //
NK106(me)004:39: bying ba gseng ba'i gnas te bskyed rim shis //
NK106(me)004:40: gangs khrod ting 'dzin gsal zhing rig pa dngas //
NK106(me)004:41: lhag mthong bsgom pa'i gnas yin bar chad nyung //
NK106(me)004:42: nags khrod shes pa gnas shing sems gnas skye //
NK106(me)004:43: zhi gnas bsgom pa'i gnas te bde shas che //
NK106(me)004:44: brag ri'i drung ni mi rtag skyo shas che //
NK106(me)004:45: dngas la byin che zhi lhag zung 'brel 'grub //
NK106(me)004:46: chu bo'i 'gram ni blo sna thung ba ste //
NK106(me)004:47: nges 'byung skyo shas gsar du skye bar byed //
NK106(me)004:48: dur khrod byin che dngos grub myur ba ste //
NK106(me)004:49: bskyed rdzogs gang la'ang mchog tu shis par gsungs //
NK106(me)004:50: grong dang tshong dus khang stong shing gcig sogs //
NK106(me)004:51: mi dang mi min 'byung po rgyu ba ni //
NK106(me)004:52: las dang po la g.yeng zhing bar du gcod //
NK106(me)004:53: brtan pa rnams la grogs te mchog tu basngagasa //
NK106(me)004:54: lha khang mchod rten rgyal 'gong gnas sa ni //
NK106(me)004:55: sems 'tshubs zhe sdang rtog tshogs skye ba ste //
NK106(me)004:56: sa phug la sogs bsen mo'i gnas rnams su //
NK106(me)004:57: 'dod chags skye zhing bying rgod lhag par che //
NK106(me)004:58: shing gcig la sogs ma mo mkha' 'gro dang //
NK106(me)004:59: brag dang ri sna dmu btsan the'u rang gnas //
NK106(me)004:60: sems 'tshubs rkyen dang bar chad mang bar 'dod //
NK106(me)004:61: gdol pa klu gnyan sa bdag gnas pa ni //
NK106(me)004:62: mtsho 'gram ne'u gseng nags khrod la sogs te //
NK106(me)004:63: yid dga' me tog ljon shing brgyan pa ni //
NK106(me)004:64: dang po dga' yang phyis nas bar chad mang //
NK106(me)004:65: mdor na gnas khang po nyams dga' la //
NK106(me)004:66: 'dris shing mi dga' dngos grub chung ba'i gnas //
NK106(me)004:67: dang po 'jigs la mi dga' 'dris shing dga' //
NK106(me)004:68: byin che dngos grub che la bar chad med //
NK106(me)004:69: de las gzhan kun bar ma phan gnod med //
NK106(me)004:70: gnas la brten nas nang gi sems 'gyur zhing //
NK106(me)004:71: dge ba'i sbyor ba 'phel 'grib gnyis yod pas //
NK106(me)004:72: sa gnas brtag pa shin tu gces par gsungs //
NK106(me)004:73: de yang bsdu na las bzhi'i gnas kyang bzhi //
NK106(me)004:74: zhi gnas yid ni lhan gyis 'dzin pa ste //
NK106(me)004:75: rgyas gnas yid dga' gzi brjid mdangs dang ldan //
NK106(me)004:76: dbang gnas yid 'phrog chags dang ldan pa ste //
NK106(me)004:77: drag gnas sems rtsub 'jigs dngangs skye bar byed //
NK106(me)004:78: dbye ba rnam pa grangs mang mtha' las 'das //
NK106(me)004:79: 'dir ni ting 'dzin zhi ba'i gnas mchog ste //
NK106(me)004:80: gzhan rnams yi ges 'jigs nas ma spros so //
NK106(me)004:81: zhi ba'i gnas der bsam gtan khang bu yang //
NK106(me)004:82: dben la yid 'dzin bkod par 'tshams pa ste //
NK106(me)004:83: phyogs med mthongs gsal che ba rab tu shis //
NK106(me)004:84: mtshan mo'i rnal 'byor mun khang 'khor ma ste //
NK106(me)004:85: mtho sar 'khor khang dbus su lte ba'i tshul //
NK106(me)004:86: byang du sngas gtad mya ngan 'das gzims bzhin //
NK106(me)004:87: nyin mo'i gnas ni snang ba'i rnal 'byor pa //
NK106(me)004:88: gangs dang chu 'bab nags dang yul la sogs //
NK106(me)004:89: khyams kyi mthong gsal che zhing nam mkha' yangs //
NK106(me)004:90: sems gsal dngas la bsil drod snyoms par bya //
NK106(me)004:91: zhi gnas dus su dben khang ra bas bskor //
NK106(me)004:92: ngang gis sems gnas skye ba'i gnas shis la //
NK106(me)004:93: lhag mthong dus su mthongs gsal dngas pa gces //
NK106(me)004:94: rgyun du yid dga' dus dang mthun pa gces //
NK106(me)004:95: nags rong la sogs dma' zhing 'thibs pa ni //
NK106(me)004:96: zhi gnas gnas yin gangs sogs mtho sa nyid //
NK106(me)004:97: lhag mthong gnas yin bye brag shes pa gces //
NK106(me)004:98: mdor na sa phyogs dang ni dben khang nyid //
NK106(me)004:99: gang du nges 'byung skyo shas blo sna thung //
NK106(me)004:100: ting 'dzin 'phel la dge la sbyor ba'i gnas //
NK106(me)004:101: snying po byang chub gnas dang mtshungs pas bsten //
NK106(me)004:102: gang du gnas pas dge 'grib nyon mongs 'phel //
NK106(me)004:103: rnam g.yeng 'du 'dzi tshe 'di'i dbang gyur na //
NK106(me)004:104: las ngan bdud kyi gnas te mkhas pas spang //
NK106(me)004:105: 'di dag rang byung pad+mas gsungs pa'i phyir //
NK106(me)004:106: thar pa 'dod pa dag gis shes par bya //
NK106(me)004:107: rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan ngal gso las //
NK106(me)004:108: ting 'dzin bsgom pa'i sa phyogs bstan pa ste gnas dang po'o ////
NK106(me)004:109: gnyis pa nyams su len pa'i gang zag kyang //
NK106(me)004:110: dad brtson nges 'byung skyo shas dang ldan zhing //
NK106(me)004:111: 'khor bas skyo ngal thar pa don du gnyer //
NK106(me)004:112: tshe 'di blos btang phyi ma byang chub 'dod //
NK106(me)004:113: rnam g.yeng 'du 'dzi rgyang bsrings nyon mongs chung //
NK106(me)004:114: khong yangs spro ring dag snang mos gus che //
NK106(me)004:115: bstan la sri zhur ldan pa de dag gis //
NK106(me)004:116: dam pa'i bla ma rab tu mnyes byas te //
NK106(me)004:117: thos bsam bsgom pas rang gi sems sbyong zhing //
NK106(me)004:118: khyad par snyan brgyud snying po'i man ngag la //
NK106(me)004:119: brtson la yun ring sgrub pas nyin mtshan 'da' //
NK106(me)004:120: tha mal phyogs su skad cig ma yengs par //
NK106(me)004:121: yang zab snying po'i don la nan tan bya //
NK106(me)004:122: nyan thos byang chub sems dang rig pa 'dzin //
NK106(me)004:123: sdom pa gsum po dag dang ma 'gal bas //
NK106(me)004:124: rang rgyud sdom zhing gzhan phan ci 'grub dang //
NK106(me)004:125: ci snang thar pa'i lam du bsgyur bar bya //
NK106(me)004:126: las dang po yis gtso bor rang don sgrub //
NK106(me)004:127: dben par sems gzung rnam g.yeng 'du 'dzi btang //
NK106(me)004:128: rkyen ngan spang zhing gnyen pos nyon mongs 'dul //
NK106(me)004:129: lta spyod ma 'dzol sgom pa lhur blang zhing //
NK106(me)004:130: dug lnga rang rgyud gang skyes skad cig la //
NK106(me)004:131: dran pas gzung zhing ma yengs gnyen po bsten //
NK106(me)004:132: sgo gsum bag yod shes bzhin ngo tsha shes //
NK106(me)004:133: khrel yod ldan pas rang rgyud gdul bar bya //
NK106(me)004:134: bstod smad dgag sgrub snyan dang mi snyan la //
NK106(me)004:135: sgyu ma rmi lam bden med mgo snyoms bya //
NK106(me)004:136: brag ca'i sgra ltar rjes mthun bzod pa bsgom //
NK106(me)004:137: nga bdag 'dzin pa'i sems kyi rtsa ba bcad //
NK106(me)004:138: mdor na ci byed chos dang mi 'gal bas //
NK106(me)004:139: rang gi rgyud bsdams gzhan la mi gnod cing //
NK106(me)004:140: nyon mongs phyogs su skad cig ma song bar //
NK106(me)004:141: nyin mtshan dge bas 'da' ba shin tu gces //
NK106(me)004:142: ding sang dus na skye bo mi srun pas //
NK106(me)004:143: dben sar rang don sgrub pa shin tu gces //
NK106(me)004:144: 'dab gshog ma rdzogs 'phur bar mi nus ltar //
NK106(me)004:145: mngon shes mi ldan gzhan don mi nus pas //
NK106(me)004:146: rang don lhur blangs yid kyis gzhan don bsam //
NK106(me)004:147: rnam g.yeng 'du 'dzi bdud kyi bslu brid 'dis //
NK106(me)004:148: rang sems ma bslus sgrub la 'bad pa gces //
NK106(me)004:149: 'chi dus 'gyod pas gdung bar ma byed cig /
NK106(me)004:150: de bas da lta sems la gsal btab ste //
NK106(me)004:151: da lta 'chi na khyer so ci 'dug ltos //
NK106(me)004:152: gar 'gro cir 'gyur gtad so ma zin par //
NK106(me)004:153: rnam g.yeng 'khrul pas nyin mtshan 'da' ba 'di //
NK106(me)004:154: dal 'byor don med chud zos byed pas na //
NK106(me)004:155: gcig pur dben par snying po'i don bsgoms shing //
NK106(me)004:156: gtan gyi 'dun ma da res legs dgos so //
NK106(me)004:157: phyi nas gar 'gro bdag la cha yod dam //
NK106(me)004:158: de bas di ring nyid du brtson par bya //
NK106(me)004:160: 'di las thar thabs dgos so sems la zung //
NK106(me)004:161: da res 'khrul na gtan du 'khrul par 'khyams //
NK106(me)004:162: de bas brtson pa skyed cig snying la zhog /
NK106(me)004:163: nyon mongs rgya mtsho bdag 'dzin brgal daka'i mtsho //
NK106(me)004:164: dal 'byor gru bos da res brgal bar bya //
NK106(me)004:165: thar lam byang chub brgya lam res 'ga' zhig /
NK106(me)004:166: bsod nams dbang gis snang ba'i gnas skabs 'dir //
NK106(me)004:167: snying nas brtson pas phan bde bsgrub par bya //
NK106(me)004:168: tshe yang mi rtag skad cig 'gyur ba ste //
NK106(me)004:169: rnam g.yeng bslu mkhas phyi bshol dge la byed //
NK106(me)004:170: 'khrul pa rgyun ring goms pa brtan pas na //
NK106(me)004:171: nyon mongs phyogs ni skad cig ngang gis 'du //
NK106(me)004:172: bsod nams dge la 'bad kyang 'byung dka' bas //
NK106(me)004:173: las kyi gdung shugs bzlog la 'bad pa gces //
NK106(me)004:174: 'khor ba'i gnas na bde ba cung zad med //
NK106(me)004:175: srid pa'i sdug bsngal bsams na bzod glags med //
NK106(me)004:176: 'di las thar thabs da res brtsam par bya //
NK106(me)004:177: snying nas snying po'i don la ma 'bad na //
NK106(me)004:178: dal khom res 'ag'i chos kyis phan mi thogs //
NK106(me)004:179: de bas mi rtag skyo shas cher bskyed de //
NK106(me)004:180: skad cig ma yengs sgrub la brtson 'grus bskyed //
NK106(me)004:181: de ltar dang po nyid du rtogs byas na //
NK106(me)004:182: phyis nas 'phags pa'i go 'phang myur du 'thob //
NK106(me)004:183: rang don 'grub cing gzhan don ngang gis 'byung //
NK106(me)004:184: 'khor ba'i gnas las thar pa'i lam mchog rnyed //
NK106(me)004:185: de phyir ci byed chos dang bstun pa ni //
NK106(me)004:186: byang chub bsgrub pa'i rten gyi gang zag yin //
NK106(me)004:187: rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan ngal gso las //
NK106(me)004:188: gang gis bsgoms pa'i gang zag bstan pa ste gnas gnyis pa'o ////
NK106(me)004:189: gsum pa nyams su blang bya'i chos la gsum /
NK106(me)004:190: sngon 'gro dngos gzhi rjes kyi rim pa'o //
NK106(me)004:191: dang po sngon du 'gro ba'i chos bstan pa //
NK106(me)004:192: mi rtag skyo shas spyi yi sngon 'gro ste //
NK106(me)004:193: tshe 'di'i zhen pa gting nas zlog par byed //
NK106(me)004:194: snying rje sems bskyed bye brag sngon 'gro ste //
NK106(me)004:195: theg chen lam du chos rnams 'gro bar byed //
NK106(me)004:196: de phyir thog mar sngon 'gro rnam gnyis sbyong //
NK106(me)004:197: de rjes khyad par mchog gi sngon 'gro ni //
NK106(me)004:198: dbang rdzogs thob nas bskyed pa rim gnyis te //
NK106(me)004:199: rang lus lha dang snod bcud lhar gsal bas //
NK106(me)004:200: tha mal 'dzin pa'i zhen pa zlog par byed //
NK106(me)004:201: zab lam bla ma'i rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis //
NK106(me)004:202: byin rlabs tshad med rtogs pa shugs las 'char //
NK106(me)004:203: bar chad kun sel dngos grub rnam gnyis thob //
NK106(me)004:204: de phyir de rjes sngon 'gro mchog gnyis bsgom //
NK106(me)004:205: de ltar sngon du 'gro ba'i chos bzhi yis //
NK106(me)004:206: ma nor lam du sems nyid tshud pa dang //
NK106(me)004:207: thar lam mchog zin gnas lugs myur du skye //
NK106(me)004:208: dngos gzhi 'byongs sla bar chad med pa dang //
NK106(me)004:209: dngos grub nye sogs yon tan tshad med ldan //
NK106(me)004:210: de phyir sngon 'gro 'byongs pa shin tu gces //
NK106(me)004:211: dngos gzhi'i rnam pa'ang bde gsal mi rtog pa'i //
NK106(me)004:212: bsam gtan thabs las gnas lugs ngo sprod de //
NK106(me)004:213: 'od gsal spros dang bral ba'i ye shes ni //
NK106(me)004:214: gnyug ma lhan cig skyes pa 'char ba yin //
NK106(me)004:215: dang po bde chen thabs la ngo sprod pa //
NK106(me)004:216: de yang sngon 'gro sngar bzhin bsgoms pa'i rjes //
NK106(me)004:217: 'khor lo bzhi dbus rtsa gsum ka ba'i tshul //
NK106(me)004:218: g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing sbubs ma can //
NK106(me)004:219: yar sna tshangs bug mar sna gsang gnas te //
NK106(me)004:220: lte ba'i thad drang dbu ma'i nang a las //
NK106(me)004:221: me 'bar spyi bo'i ham las bdud rtsi bab //
NK106(me)004:222: 'khor lo bzhi dang lus nang kun gang ste //
NK106(me)004:223: bde bas khyab dus snying gar bam yig la //
NK106(me)004:224: ham gi bdud rtsi rgyun chad med par 'bab //
NK106(me)004:225: bde ba'i nyams ni ma skyes bar du bsgom //
NK106(me)004:226: de nas bam yang je chung je phra las //
NK106(me)004:227: dmigs bsam spros dang bral ba'i ngang du gzhag /
NK106(me)004:228: thabs des sems zin bde bas zhi gnas skye //
NK106(me)004:229: de nas gang yang brjod las 'das pa'i sems //
NK106(me)004:230: blo bral nam mkha' 'dra ba'i ngang nyid 'char //
NK106(me)004:231: de ni 'od gsal bde stong rdzogs pa che //
NK106(me)004:232: dngas shing bsam gyis mi khyab chos nyid yin //
NK106(me)004:233: de nyid goms las nyams kyang rnam pa bzhi //
NK106(me)004:234: gang snang thams cad bde bar 'char ba dang //
NK106(me)004:235: nyin mtshan bde ba'i ngang las 'bral mi phod //
NK106(me)004:236: chags sdang la sogs zug rngus rgyud mi 'khrugs //
NK106(me)004:237: chos kyi tshig don rtogs pa'i shes rab skye //
NK106(me)004:238: de nas yang bsgoms spyan dang mngon shes sogs //
NK106(me)004:239: yon tan dpag med nyi ma sems la 'char //
NK106(me)004:240: 'di ni yang zab gnad kyi gdams pa yin //
NK106(me)004:241: gnyis pa gsal ba' thabs kyi ngo sprad pa //
NK106(me)004:242: sngon 'gro sngar bzhin rtsa gsum gsal btab pa'i //
NK106(me)004:243: ro rkyang gug pa dbu mar 'jug pa'i tshul //
NK106(me)004:244: mar snar bsgoms la yar snar sna bug gtad //
NK106(me)004:245: rlung ro gsum bus nad gdon sdig sgrib song //
NK106(me)004:246: dal bus tshur rngubs brtan g.yo'i 'jig rten kun //
NK106(me)004:247: 'od zhu sna nas tshur byung ro rkyang nas //
NK106(me)004:248: dbu ma'i nang byung snying dbus tshon gang 'od //
NK106(me)004:249: gong bu la thim thub thang bar du gzung //
NK106(me)004:250: steng 'og kha sbyar gtong dus cung zad gzung //
NK106(me)004:251: dal bus 'byung rngubs bya ba shin tu gces //
NK106(me)004:252: gzhan yang sangs rgyas la sogs yon tan kun //
NK106(me)004:253: snying gar thim las gzhan du ma yengs bya //
NK106(me)004:254: thabs des sems gsal dngas la gnas pa 'byung //
NK106(me)004:255: de rjes snying ga'i 'od las 'od mched de //
NK106(me)004:256: lus nang 'khor lo bzhi nang 'bar ba las //
NK106(me)004:257: phyir mched 'jig rten 'od kyis gang bar bsgom //
NK106(me)004:258: zhag 'gar nyin mtshan de nyid don bsgoms pas //
NK106(me)004:259: rmi lam 'gag dang 'od kyi snang ba ni //
NK106(me)004:260: zla ba 'bar ba me khyer skar ma sogs //
NK106(me)004:261: 'od lnga'i snang bas phyi nang khyab pa mthong //
NK106(me)004:262: gsal ba'i ngang du sems zin zhi gnas skye //
NK106(me)004:263: de nas slar bsdu snying ga'i 'od de yang //
NK106(me)004:264: je chung je phrar stong nyid ngang la gzhag /
NK106(me)004:265: gang du'ang mi dmigs stong gsal dngas pa'i sems //
NK106(me)004:266: rang bzhin spros pa'i mtha' dang bral ba 'char //
NK106(me)004:267: de ni gsal stong gnyug ma'i ye shes te //
NK106(me)004:268: rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i gnas lugs yin //
NK106(me)004:269: de nyid goms las nyams kyang rnam pa bzhi //
NK106(me)004:270: gang snang 'al 'ol zang thal gsal ba snyam //
NK106(me)004:271: nyin mtshan gsal ba'i ngang la gnas pa dang //
NK106(me)004:272: rnam rtog mi g.yo sems gsal dngas pa dang //
NK106(me)004:273: shes rab klong rdol gzung 'dzin bral ba'o //
NK106(me)004:274: de yang goms las mngon shes 'char ba dang //
NK106(me)004:275: sgrib pas chod kyang pha rol zang thal sogs //
NK106(me)004:276: mthong ba'i spyan dang rdzu 'phrul 'grub par 'gyur //
NK106(me)004:277: 'di ni yang zab gdams pa'i nying khu yin //
NK106(me)004:278: gsum pa mi rtog thabs kyis ngo sprad nas //
NK106(me)004:279: sngon 'gro sngar bzhin dngos gzhi rnam pa gsum //
NK106(me)004:280: 'phang ba gzung ba sbyang ba'i rim pa las //
NK106(me)004:281: 'phang ba snying gar sems nyid 'od gsal ba //
NK106(me)004:282: ha'am 'od kyi gong bu tshon gang zhig /
NK106(me)004:283: ha zhes nyer gcig ngar dang bcas brjod pas //
NK106(me)004:284: rgyangs kyis spyi gtsug nas 'thon mkha' la song //
NK106(me)004:285: je mtho je mthor mthar ni bltar med pa'i //
NK106(me)004:286: ngang du lus sems khong glod mnyam par gzhag /
NK106(me)004:287: skad cig de la rnam rtog rgyun chad de //
NK106(me)004:288: smra bsam brjod du med pa'i ngang la gnas //
NK106(me)004:289: nyams kyang bltar med bsam yul 'das pa 'byung //
NK106(me)004:290: gzung ba nyi ma'i ngos la rgyab gtad de //
NK106(me)004:291: dngas pa'i mkha' la mig gtad lhan ner gzhag /
NK106(me)004:292: rlung rgyu mi tshor ci nas dal bar bya //
NK106(me)004:293: mi rtog spros dang bral ba khong nas 'char //
NK106(me)004:294: rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bu'i nyams skye'o //
NK106(me)004:295: sbyang ba mkha' la mig gtad ma yengs par //
NK106(me)004:296: sems gsal spro bsdu med pa'i ngang de nas //
NK106(me)004:297: sa rdo ri brag snod bcud thams cad kyang //
NK106(me)004:298: zang thal nam mkha' gcig tu song bar bsgom //
NK106(me)004:299: rang gi lus kyang rags pa'i dngos med de //
NK106(me)004:300: sems dang nam mkha' dbyer med ngang du gzhag /
NK106(me)004:301: phyi nang bar gsum rnam dbye med pa'i chos //
NK106(me)004:302: nam mkha'i ngang der lus sems khong glod la //
NK106(me)004:303: dran bsam yid la byed pa rang zhi'i ngang //
NK106(me)004:304: spro bsdu med pa'i sems nyid rang sor gzhag /
NK106(me)004:305: de tshe chos nyid bsam brjod 'das pa'i sems //
NK106(me)004:306: gnyis med nam mkha' lta bu'i dgongs pa 'char //
NK106(me)004:307: 'di ni dus gsum rgyal ba'i snying po yin //
NK106(me)004:308: de ltar bsgoms pas nyams kyang rnam pa bzhi //
NK106(me)004:309: gang snang phyam phyam rags pa'i 'du shes med //
NK106(me)004:310: nyin mtshan mi rtag ngang las 'bral mi phod //
NK106(me)004:311: dug lnga rang zhi sems rgyud 'jam la des //
NK106(me)004:312: chos kun nam mkha' 'dra ba'i nyams myong skye //
NK106(me)004:313: de ltar mi rtog gsum la goms pa yis //
NK106(me)004:314: spyan dang mngon shes ting 'dzin yon tan 'grub //
NK106(me)004:315: thabs dang shes rab zhi lhag zung 'brel bas //
NK106(me)004:316: gnas skabs mthar thug don gnyis phun sum tshogs //
NK106(me)004:317: gsum pa rjes kyi chos la rnam pa bzhi //
NK106(me)004:318: nyams dang bogs 'byin rtogs pa 'bras bu'o //
NK106(me)004:319: nyams la gnyis las skyon med sngar bstan la //
NK106(me)004:320: skyon can so so'i 'dzin zhen las byung ba //
NK106(me)004:321: bde chags gsal chags mi rtog chags pa dang //
NK106(me)004:322: mthar 'dzin zhen rtog dug dang 'dres pa gsum //
NK106(me)004:323: bde log khams 'dzag 'dod chags rang ga dang //
NK106(me)004:324: snying mi dga' dang bying ba shas che dang //
NK106(me)004:325: gsal log rlung rgod zhe sdang rang ga dang //
NK106(me)004:326: rnam rtog rags dang rgod dang 'phro shas che //
NK106(me)004:327: mi rtog log pa gti mug rang ga dang //
NK106(me)004:328: sems bying gnyid rmugs che dang 'du shes med //
NK106(me)004:329: de ltar mthun dang log pa'i skyon can rnams //
NK106(me)004:330: gang byung ngos gzung gnyen pos bcos par bya //
NK106(me)004:331: bogs 'byin nyams bcos thabs dang gong du spel //
NK106(me)004:332: nyams bcos pa yang rnam pa gsum nyid de //
NK106(me)004:333: rab kyis lta bas bcos te chos rnams kun //
NK106(me)004:334: blo btags sgyu 'dra ngo bo ngos gzung med //
NK106(me)004:335: phyam gcig mkha' 'dra snyems bral rang ngos stong //
NK106(me)004:336: 'dzin zhen med pa'i ngang der la bazla'o //
NK106(me)004:337: gol sgrib nyams de gnas lugs chen por 'char //
NK106(me)004:338: bar chad dge bskul rkyen ngan byang chub grogs //
NK106(me)004:339: gzhi bde'i steng du blo bde rgyun mi 'chad //
NK106(me)004:340: 'bring gis sgom pas bcos te dngas phyung la //
NK106(me)004:341: shes pa 'gyur la thebs shing dran pas gzung //
NK106(me)004:342: ma yengs bde gsal mi rtog ngang la gzhag /
NK106(me)004:343: yengs dang 'jur la ma thebs skyon yin pas //
NK106(me)004:344: skad cig ma yengs ngang la gzhag pa gces //
NK106(me)004:345: khams 'dzag pa la rdo rje'i bum pa ru //
NK106(me)004:346: h'u las me 'bar lus nang khams kun bsregs //
NK106(me)004:347: ci yang med pa'i ngang la bsgoms pas sel //
NK106(me)004:348: nad 'dzag gdon 'dzag gang la'ang gnad 'di zab //
NK106(me)004:349: bde la 'dzin pa bshig nas stong par bsgoms //
NK106(me)004:350: 'dod chags rang ga'i sems la cher bltas te //
NK106(me)004:351: bcos bslad re dogs med pa'i ngang bzhag pas //
NK106(me)004:352: 'dod chags rang grol bde stong ye shes 'char //
NK106(me)004:353: snying mi dga' ba thig le nyams pa'i skyon //
NK106(me)004:354: de la 'bar 'dzag bde ba'i bsam gtan bsgom //
NK106(me)004:355: bying shas che na dngas snyigs ma phyed skyon //
NK106(me)004:356: de la lus gnad drang por 'dug byas la //
NK106(me)004:357: kha sbyar rlung bzung snying nang 'od kyiis khengs //
NK106(me)004:358: snang srid 'od khengs gsal stong bsgoms pas grol //
NK106(me)004:359: gsal 'dzin nyams la 'dzin med chen por sbyong //
NK106(me)004:360: gsal log rmugs na dngas gsal sems bsgom zhing //
NK106(me)004:361: rgod cing 'phro na mig btsums snying nang du //
NK106(me)004:362: 'od dang yi ge pad+ma ral gri'am //
NK106(me)004:363: rgya gram bsgoms pa je dma' je dma' las //
NK106(me)004:364: snying gi nang nas lung thag je ring song //
NK106(me)004:365: 'og gzhi gser gyi sa gzhir bab par bsgom //
NK106(me)004:366: des ni mi sel mi srid nges pa'i gnad //
NK106(me)004:367: zhe sdang rang ga 'phros thog tsan ne gzhag /
NK106(me)004:368: gsal stong me long ye shes ngang du grol //
NK106(me)004:369: mi rtog ngang 'char 'dzin med gnad kyis sbyang //
NK106(me)004:370: gti mug sems de ngos gzung cer gyis brtag /
NK106(me)004:371: skad cig rang grol chos dbyings ye shes 'char //
NK106(me)004:372: bying zhing rmugs te 'du shes med pa na //
NK106(me)004:373: snying nang 'od bsgoms tshangs bug nas 'thon te //
NK106(me)004:374: gzhu gang tsam gyi nam mkhar lding nge gnas //
NK106(me)004:375: 'di ni yang zab gnad kyi gdams pa yin //
NK106(me)004:376: spyir ni gang la'ang 'dzin med gnad du che //
NK106(me)004:377: re dogs bral na gegs rnams kun las grol //
NK106(me)004:378: stong gsal sems nyid dngas pa'i ngang nyid du //
NK106(me)004:379: blo yi rnam pa spro bsdu med par gzhag /
NK106(me)004:380: gegs dang spang bya'i 'phrang las grol bar nges //
NK106(me)004:381: tha mas spyod pas bcos pa'i rim pa yang //
NK106(me)004:382: lta stangs rdzas dang rten 'brel gsum nyid las //
NK106(me)004:383: spyi yi lta stangs rnam snang chos bdun te //
NK106(me)004:384: skyil krung mig mi 'gul dang rlung dal dang //
NK106(me)004:385: mnyam gzhag mgrin pa gug dang lce rtse rkan //
NK106(me)004:386: sna rtser mig phab blta bas rlung sems snyoms //
NK106(me)004:387: bying rgod med cing ma nor bsam gtan skye //
NK106(me)004:388: 'di ltar skyon kun lus gnad 'khrugs pa yis //
NK106(me)004:389: rtsa 'khrugs rlung 'khrugs thig le 'khrugs pa las //
NK106(me)004:390: 'byung bas ma dkrugs mnyam par gzhag pa gces //
NK106(me)004:391: yon tan yang ni rtsa thig rlung gsum nyid //
NK106(me)004:392: mi g.yo gnad du song las 'byung bas na //
NK106(me)004:393: de phyir gnad 'di rtogs pa rab tu gces //
NK106(me)004:394: 'khrul 'khor lus sbyong gzhan dang 'dra ba las //
NK106(me)004:395: khyad par dal 'jam ma 'khrugs gnad du che //
NK106(me)004:396: 'jam la rtsub dang rtsub la 'jam pa gnad //
NK106(me)004:397: khams dang bstun pa shin tu gces pa yin //
NK106(me)004:398: bye brag bde la lag pa gru mor bsnol //
NK106(me)004:399: mig phab bde la sems gzung gnad yin no //
NK106(me)004:400: gsal la lag gnyis pus mo'i steng du dgab //
NK106(me)004:401: rlung dal mig ni bar snang har por blta //
NK106(me)004:402: mi rtog chos bdun rang gar gnas pas 'grub //
NK106(me)004:403: rdzas ni dus dang mthun pa'i gnas dang grogs //
NK106(me)004:404: bza' btung la sogs nyams la gang phan bsten //
NK106(me)004:405: rten 'brel khams 'dzag pa la gzhon nu mas //
NK106(me)004:406: bkal ba'i skud pa sum sgril sngags bzlas te //
NK106(me)004:407: sked par btags pas thig le bsrung ba yin //
NK106(me)004:408: rtog pa 'phro na tsan+dana ge sar dang //
NK106(me)004:409: zhun chen ril bu bsten pas mi rtog 'grub //
NK106(me)004:410: rmugs na gur gum ga pur byang chub sems //
NK106(me)004:411: ril bus ting 'dzin 'grub par rgyud las gsungs //
NK106(me)004:412: bde gsal mi rtog skyon med gong 'phel ba //
NK106(me)004:413: dmigs pa gang rung sems bzung mchog tu basngagasa //
NK106(me)004:414: dang por dmigs yul la gtad bsgoms pa yis //
NK106(me)004:415: de rjes dmigs med ngang du lhan gyis 'gro //
NK106(me)004:416: gnad 'di shin tu yang zab mchog yin pas //
NK106(me)004:417: skal ldan rnams kyis dang du blang bar bya //
NK106(me)004:418: mtshan bcas yin zhes spang ba blun po'i lam //
NK106(me)004:419: nyams myong med pa'i lugs yin dor bar bya //
NK106(me)004:420: khyad par bde ba'i bogs 'byin dam pa ni //
NK106(me)004:421: 'og rlung 'then la gsang ba'i gnas nyid nas //
NK106(me)004:422: thig le yar thim spyi gtsug nyid du thim //
NK106(me)004:423: gang yang dmigs med ngang la gzhag par bya //
NK106(me)004:424: de rjes steng 'og kha sbyar rlung bzung la //
NK106(me)004:425: snying gar sems gtad skye med ngang la bzhag /
NK106(me)004:426: bde gsal spros bral ngang la gnas pa yin //
NK106(me)004:427: bar bar seng ge rtsal sprugs la sogs pa //
NK106(me)004:428: dbab bzlog drang zhing dgram dang la bzla ba'i //
NK106(me)004:429: 'khrul 'khor dmigs gnad mthong ba brgyud bzhin bya //
NK106(me)004:430: dbab pa 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya nyid dang ni //
NK106(me)004:431: ro smod smad gsigs gnon pa lta bur bya //
NK106(me)004:432: dmigs pa ham las byang sems babs pa yis //
NK106(me)004:433: gsang bar byung dus bde la dmigs pa gtad //
NK106(me)004:434: bzlog pa de nas gyen du drangs pa ste //
NK106(me)004:435: lag gnyis mkhal khung rgya mtsho brag la sbyar //
NK106(me)004:436: 'og rlung 'then la lce rtse rkan la sbyar //
NK106(me)004:437: mig sprin bzlog cing mgo bsgril 'dar ba bzhin //
NK106(me)004:438: dmigs pa thig le ba thag brgyus pa bzhin //
NK106(me)004:439: gcig la gcig thim spyi gtsug bar du bsam //
NK106(me)004:440: dgram pa gzhu 'gengs rkang lag rtsal sprugs bya //
NK106(me)004:441: si zhes lce rtse so sbyar rlung phyir 'bud //
NK106(me)004:442: la bzla gan rkyal rlung sems sos dal la //
NK106(me)004:443: gar yang mi rtog cir yang mi 'dzin pas //
NK106(me)004:444: rang bzhin spros dang bral ba'i ngang la gzhag /'di yis gegs med bde chen byang chub 'grub //
NK106(me)004:445: gsal ba rlung gi bogs 'byin dam pa yang //
NK106(me)004:446: 'jam rtsub gcig gis gcig gi bogs 'byin la //
NK106(me)004:447: khyad par nang bzung phyir bzung gcig gis gcig /
NK106(me)004:448: dal 'jam phan tshun gnad dang bsre ba gces //
NK106(me)004:449: grangs dang kha dog reg bya dbyibs la sogs //
NK106(me)004:450: du ma'i thabs la bslab pa'ang gsungs mod kyi //
NK106(me)004:451: 'dir ni gcig gis kun 'grub man ngag la //
NK106(me)004:452: 'di ltar bslab pa gnad kyi rgyal po yin //
NK106(me)004:453: lus gnad khyad par sngar bzhin lus mi 'gul //
NK106(me)004:454: rlung ni kha sna gsum mnyam shin tu dal //
NK106(me)004:455: tha mal rang grol ngang la lhod kyis glod //
NK106(me)004:456: sems gnad gang ru'ang mi gzung rang bzhin bya //
NK106(me)004:457: de rjes gan rkyal rkang lag brgyang byas te //
NK106(me)004:458: ha zhes drag la sems ni mkha' dkyil gtad //
NK106(me)004:459: yeng med spro bsdu bral ba lhan ner gzhag /
NK106(me)004:460: rlung sems rang grol gdod ma'i ngang gnas pa //
NK106(me)004:461: gegs med yon tan 'char sgo dpag tu med //
NK106(me)004:462: lus yang rgyu ba med dang spros pa zhi //
NK106(me)004:463: sems gsal rab tu dngas shing mngon shes 'char //
NK106(me)004:464: rkang mgyogs 'grub cing mdog snum ting 'dzin skye //
NK106(me)004:465: rlung sems dbu mar tshud pa'i rtags rnams 'byung //
NK106(me)004:466: yang zab gnad kyi mchog yin shin tu gsang //
NK106(me)004:467: mi rtog nam mkha' lta bu'i bogs 'byin yang //
NK106(me)004:468: lus sems khong glod dmigs pa rtse gcig bzung //
NK106(me)004:469: gcig la ma yengs cer re bltas pa yis //
NK106(me)004:470: rnam rtog gzhan rnams de yi ngang nub ste //
NK106(me)004:471: dmigs rten de la rtog pa'ang rab zhi nas //
NK106(me)004:472: snang la der 'dzin med pa'i rtogs pa 'char //
NK106(me)004:473: 'di ni gnad yin gzhan yang 'di ltar bslab //
NK106(me)004:474: res 'ga' dmigs pa phyir bzung rlung phu la //
NK106(me)004:475: phyi ru ci gnas gzhag pas mi rtog skye //
NK106(me)004:476: res 'ga' nang bzung stod smad gang rung du //
NK106(me)004:477: dmigs rten gcig la ma yengs tsen ne gzhag /
NK106(me)004:478: res 'ga' rten med shes pa rang zhir gzhag /
NK106(me)004:479: yul snang der 'dzin med pa'i ngang la gnas //
NK106(me)004:480: 'di ni mi rtog chos sku'i dgongs pa ste //
NK106(me)004:481: gnad la brten nas rang byung khong nas 'char //
NK106(me)004:482: bde gsal mi rtog spyi yi bogs 'byin ni //
NK106(me)004:483: tshogs bsags sgrib sbyong bskyed rdzogs bsgom pa dang //
NK106(me)004:484: lam zab bla ma'i rnal 'byor mchog tu basngagasa //
NK106(me)004:485: 'di ni mthar thug gnad kyi gdams pa ste //
NK106(me)004:486: skal bzang thar pa 'dod pas dang du blang //
NK106(me)004:487: de ltar bsgoms pas shar ba'i rtogs pa yang //
NK106(me)004:488: ro mnyam gcig ste tha dad du ma med //
NK106(me)004:489: phyogs gsum gcig tu 'du ba'i don sa dang //
NK106(me)004:490: chu bran tha dad rgya mtshor gcig pa ltar //
NK106(me)004:491: bde gsal mi rtog thabs gsum gang bsgoms kyang //
NK106(me)004:492: sems nyid ma skyes nam mkha'i ngang nyid du //
NK106(me)004:493: blo yi 'jug pa rab zhi thim pa na //
NK106(me)004:494: yod med spros dang bral ba'i byang chub sems //
NK106(me)004:495: 'od gsal gshis kyi nyi ma khong nas 'char //
NK106(me)004:496: grub bsal 'pho 'gyur med pa'i rtogs pa ste //
NK106(me)004:497: mkha' mnyam bde gshegs snying po'i rang bzhin no //
NK106(me)004:498: de tshe rtse gcig dngas gsal rnyog med pa //
NK106(me)004:499: zhi lhag spangs pa'i bsam gtan rgya mtsho la //
NK106(me)004:500: phyogs bral 'dzin med gzugs brnyan rang bzhin med //
NK106(me)004:501: chos kun rtogs pa'i ngo bo zung du 'brel //
NK106(me)004:502: snang ba sgyu 'dra stong pa der 'dzin med //
NK106(me)004:503: zung 'jug dbyer med dgongs klong yangs pa ni //
NK106(me)004:504: gnad las byung ba'i 'od gsal khong nas 'char //
NK106(me)004:505: bla ma'i byin rlabs rang byung ye shes ni //
NK106(me)004:506: tshig dang bsam brjod 'das tshe mthong ba ste //
NK106(me)004:507: de lta bu nyid dus su mthong ba ni //
NK106(me)004:508: dus gsum dus med phyi nang dbye bsal med //
NK106(me)004:509: shes rab pha rol phyin yin dbu ma ste //
NK106(me)004:510: spros dang sdug bsngal zhi byed phyag rgya che //
NK106(me)004:511: snying po'i chos nyid rdzogs pa chen po ste //
NK106(me)004:512: gdod ma'i zad pa gshis kyi gnas lugs nyid //
NK106(me)004:513: 'od gsal sems nyid rang byung ye shes yin //
NK106(me)004:514: ming mang btags kyang don gyi ngo bo gcig /
NK106(me)004:515: sems nyid smra bsam brjod 'das byang chub sems //
NK106(me)004:516: 'khor 'das gnyis med nam mkha' lta bu yin //
NK106(me)004:517: phyogs ris ma 'dzin grub matha'i gzeb las 'das //
NK106(me)004:518: phyogs bral gnyis med mnyam rdzogs chen po ste //
NK106(me)004:519: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa mtha' bral klong yangs su //
NK106(me)004:520: rnal 'byor rnams kyis yangs su shes par bya //
NK106(me)004:521: de dag mthar phyin 'bras bu'i rim pa ni //
NK106(me)004:522: gnas skabs bde gsal mi rtog zung 'jug gis //
NK106(me)004:523: spyan dang mngon shes yon tan dpag med cing //
NK106(me)004:524: mthar thug sku gsum yid bzhin rgyal chos 'grub //
NK106(me)004:525: rang gzhan don gnyis lhun gyis grub pa yin //
NK106(me)004:526: rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan ngal gso las /
NK106(me)004:527: gang bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ste gnas gsum pa'o ////
NK106(me)004:528: de ltar chos tshul zhi ba snying po'i don //
NK106(me)004:529: zab cing rgya che bshad pa'i bsod nams des //
NK106(me)004:530: 'gro kun byang chub dam pa gnyis thob nas //
NK106(me)004:531: yid bzhin 'phrin las 'byor pa mtha' yas shog /'di ni rgyal sras dri med 'od zer gyis //
NK106(me)004:532: rang gi nyams len gnad dril bcud bsdus te //
NK106(me)004:533: phyi rabs don du gsal bar bshad pa ni //
NK106(me)004:534: gangs ri thod dkar mgul du legs par bkod //
NK106(me)004:535: thar pa 'dod pa dag gis brtson byas te //
NK106(me)004:536: yi ge 'di bzhin nyams su blang bar mdzod //
NK106(me)004:537: gnas skabs mthar thug don gnyis phun tshogs te //
NK106(me)004:538: bde chen gling du myur du dga' bde byed //
NK106(me)004:539: rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan ngal gso zhes bya ba /
NK106(me)004:540: dpal o rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po mtsho skyes
NK106(me)004:541: rdo rjes rjes su bzung ba'i rnal 'byor ba dri
NK106(me)004:542: med 'od zer gyis gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul
NK106(me)004:543: du legs par bkod pa rdzogs so //
